LandingPage.title: Local Digital Eye
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: Local Digital Eye provides powerful AI-driven insights to help businesses thrive in the digital landscape. Analyze, compare, and get tailored recommendations.
LandingPage.readyToElevateSubtitle: Join Local Digital Eye today and transform how you approach digital strategy for local enterprises.

businessDiscovery.title: Business Discovery
businessDiscovery.description: Easily find and add businesses for in-depth analysis using URLs or business details.

insightfulDashboards.title: Insightful Dashboards
insightfulDashboards.description: Visualize analysis with scores, sentiments, and competitor data in a clear, actionable dashboard.

aiRecommendations.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
aiRecommendations.description: Receive AI-driven suggestions for digital services tailored to business needs and market gaps.

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: Automatically identify and compare against direct competitors to understand market positioning.

geographicTargeting.title: Geographic Targeting
geographicTargeting.description: Utilize interactive maps to search businesses by category within specific geographic zones.

actionableReports.title: Actionable Reports
actionableReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports including diagnostics, recommendations, and competitive insights.
